title: Exploring Aries Markets Lending
description: Learn about Aries Markets, a lending and borrowing protocol on Aptos that allows users to earn interest on deposits and access liquidity by borrowing against their crypto assets.

tasks.title: Prepare for Lending Activities
tasks.description: Add at least 0.1 APT to your wallet to begin exploring Aries Markets

tasks.title: Aries Markets Basics
tasks.description: Understand what Aries Markets offers in the Aptos ecosystem
tasks.question: What is the primary function of Aries Markets?
options: NFT trading platform
Decentralized exchange (DEX)
Lending and borrowing protocol
Options trading platform

tasks.title: Interest Rate Model
tasks.description: Learn how interest rates work on Aries Markets
tasks.question: How are interest rates determined on Aries Markets?
options: Fixed rates set by the team
By user votes in governance
Dynamic rates based on supply and demand in each market
Based on central bank rates
tasks.correctAnswer: Dynamic rates based on supply and demand in each market

tasks.title: Supplying Assets
tasks.description: Understanding how lending works on Aries
tasks.question: What happens when you supply assets to Aries Markets?
options: Your assets are locked for a fixed period
You receive aToken receipts representing your deposit that earn interest
Your assets are converted to stablecoins
Your assets are used to buy the protocol's governance token
tasks.correctAnswer: You receive aToken receipts representing your deposit that earn interest

tasks.title: Borrowing Mechanism
tasks.description: Learn how borrowing works on Aries
tasks.question: How does borrowing on Aries Markets work?
options: Unsecured loans based on credit score
Overcollateralized loans where you deposit more value than you borrow
Fixed-term loans with mandatory repayment dates
Loans directly from other users without protocol involvement
tasks.correctAnswer: Overcollateralized loans where you deposit more value than you borrow

tasks.title: Health Factor
tasks.question: What is the health factor in Aries Markets?
options: A rating of the protocol's overall security
A measure of a user's credit worthiness
A ratio showing how close a position is to liquidation
The APY rate for deposits
tasks.correctAnswer: A ratio showing how close a position is to liquidation

tasks.title: Liquidation Process
tasks.question: What happens during a liquidation on Aries Markets?
options: The user's account is permanently restricted
A portion of the collateral is sold to repay the loan and bring the position back to safety
The entire loan is forgiven
The user is given a warning and 7 days to add more collateral
tasks.correctAnswer: A portion of the collateral is sold to repay the loan and bring the position back to safety

tasks.title: Risk Levels
tasks.question: How does Aries Markets manage different asset risks?
options: All assets have the same risk parameters
By requiring KYC for riskier assets
By assigning different loan-to-value ratios and liquidation thresholds based on asset volatility
By only listing stablecoins
tasks.correctAnswer: By assigning different loan-to-value ratios and liquidation thresholds based on asset volatility

tasks.title: Protocol Governance
tasks.question: How are important protocol changes decided in Aries Markets?
options: Solely by the founding team
By a vote of ARX token holders
By Aptos Foundation
By major liquidity providers only
tasks.correctAnswer: By a vote of ARX token holders
